title: Bride wearing light colored gown with lace ruffle on bottom of skirt and lace overlay on bodice with high neckline, long lace sleeves, and long veil with decorative headband, walking down light colored runner on church aisle with groom wearing dark striped pants, dark morning coat and vest, light colored button down collared shirt, striped ascot, and boutonniere, two bridesmaids standing on left, two groomsmen standing on right, stained glass window in background, men and women seated in pews on left and right
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
